citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although the facility provides enrichment for its birds, a written environmental enhancement plan for birds had not been
developed by the facility and was not available for review. This plan is necessary to promote the psychological well-being
of birds. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan that has been approved by the
attending veterinarian. The plan must be in accordance with the regulations and with currently accepted professional
standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides. At a minimum, the plan must address each of
the following: social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices, and exemptions.
Correct by 11/15/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
Although the facility provides enrichment for its birds, a written environmental enhancement plan for birds had not been 
developed by the facility and was not available for review. This plan is necessary to promote the psychological well-being 
of birds. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan that has been approved by the 
attending veterinarian. The plan must be in accordance with the regulations and with currently accepted professional 
standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides. At a minimum, the plan must address each of 
the following: social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices, and exemptions.  
 
Correct by 11/15/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
